name: GlowingOverscrollIndicator
desc: A visual indication that a scroll view has overscrolled.

fields.name: showLeading
fields.desc: Whether to show the overscroll glow on the side with negative scroll offsets.

fields.name: showTrailing
fields.desc: Whether to show the overscroll glow on the side with positive scroll offsets.

fields.name: axisDirection
fields.desc: {@template flutter.overscroll.axisDirection} The direction of positive scroll offsets in the [Scrollable] whose overscrolls are to be visualized. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: color
fields.desc: The color of the glow. The alpha channel is ignored.

fields.name: notificationPredicate
fields.desc: {@template flutter.overscroll.notificationPredicate} A check that specifies whether a [ScrollNotification] should be handled by this widget.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.
